Package com.camerontec.util.logger

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILogger
    Catalys logging API.
    ILoggerContext
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of providing a logging context.
    ILoggerFactory
    Factory of ILoggers.
    ILogLevelControllerMXBean
    Remote interface for controlling the log level of different loggers.
    ProgressReporter
    Reports the progress of a long-running task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractProgressReporter
    ProgressReporter implementation that provides progress common reporting functionality.
    CompositeLogMarker
    Implementation of org.slf4j.Marker which supports composition via log marker names.
    LoggerManager
    Singleton instance serving as a Facade for the Catalys logging subsystem.
    LoggerNameFactory
    Factory for logger name generation.
    LoggerTypeFactory
    CameronTec Software module.
    LogLevelController
    Log level controller implementation.
    LogMarkers
    General purpose log markers for us in conjunction with ILogger.
    MappedLoggerContext
    Simple, map based, implementation of a logger context.
    MarkerExternalizer
    Helper class for serializing/deserializing Marker implementations.
    ThreadLocalLoggerContext
    Class which decorates a MappedLoggerContext with a thread local wrapper.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FindDirection
    Represents the direction for a Find through the logs.
    Level
    Catalys logging levels.
    LoggerType
    Enumeration of the application types whose logs can be processed by the Management Agent.
